page.title: 09NOTTINGHAM - ALFRETON ROAD
page.content: Alfreton Road leads to lots of different places like the M1 which is the motorway through Nottingham.It also leads to the centre of town.This is partly why the road is so busy. Another reason is the variety of shops and restaurants.There are Indian, Italian, and Chinese restaurants and lots more.There also chip shops and various take away shops.There are plenty of pubs.One is called "The Generous Britain", another "The Running Horse". I think Alfreton Road is a very dirty place, but it's not surprising because the food shops just dump their rubbish in the alleyways.The best shop for me on Alfreton Road is Temple's Newsagent.It sells everything a newsagent should.
